## ğŸ¤– What is CorpMeet-AI?

CorpMeet-AI transforms your meeting recordings into actionable insights through advanced AI processing. Whether you're managing corporate meetings, team standups, or client calls, our platform provides:

- **ğŸ¯ Smart Action Item Extraction** - Automatically identifies and categorizes action items
- **ğŸ“Š Intelligent Meeting Summaries** - Generates concise, professional meeting summaries
- **ğŸ” Decision Tracking** - Captures and organizes key decisions made during meetings
- **ğŸ“„ Professional PDF Reports** - Export beautifully formatted meeting minutes
- **ğŸ” Advanced Search** - Find any meeting or discussion point instantly
- **ğŸ“ˆ Analytics Dashboard** - Track meeting trends and team productivity
